title: Michael Christmas - Converse Rubber Tracks Live
description:
Spend five minutes with Michael Christmas and you’ll find it difficult to resist his open smile and effortless confidence. Take another five to hear his music and you’ll understand what he’s so confident about: the Boston native’s low key, hook-filled raps about good snacks and bad cars are as refreshing as skipping work to hang out with your old neighborhood friends. 

Michael Christmas came into the studio at Converse Rubber Tracks with a mindset that perfectly reflected his approach to music: humble, unpretentious, and totally confident in his ability to make fresh material.
